pages.title: Gem Transmutation
pages.text: With the knowledge of gem transmutation your dwarf can craft you high quality fey gems. All you have to do is provide the correct Ingredients.

pages.title: Gem Transmutation
pages.text: Requires 50 - 150 mana stored into the dwarven Anvil.

pages.title: Recipe
pages.text: Either requires 5 Lesser, 5 Greater or 5 Shiny Fey Gems to transmute to their superior versions. Make sure the schematics for gem transmutation are present for the Dwarf Blacksmith to receive instructions and start crafting.
